import React, { Fragment, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import { globalConnect } from "../../redux/connect/globalConnect"; import Spinner from "../../components/layouts/spinner"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; function EditProfile(props) { let history = useHistory(); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ company: "", website: "", location: "", status: "", skills: [], // comma separated array bio: "", githubUserName: "", experience: [], // array education: [], // array youtube: "", twitter: "", facebook: "", instagram: "", linkedin: "", }); const onChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }); }; useEffect(() => { props.getUserProfile(); }, []); const submitForm = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); props.createOrUpdateProfile({ formData, history }); }; const { company, website, location, status, skills, // comma separated array bio, githubUserName, experience, // array education, // array youtube, twitter, facebook, instagram, linkedin, } = formData; return props.profile.loading ? ( ) : (

Create Your Profile

Let's get some information to make your profile stand out

* = required field
{ submitForm(e); }} >
Give us an idea of where you are at in your career
onChange(e)} /> Could be your own company or one you work for
onChange(e)} value={website} /> Could be your own or a company website
onChange(e)} value={location} /> City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
onChange(e)} value={skills} /> Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
onChange(e)} value={githubUserName} /> If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself
Optional
onChange(e)} value={twitter} />
onChange(e)} value={facebook} />
onChange(e)} value={youtube} />
onChange(e)} value={linkedin} />
onChange(e)} value={instagram} />
Go Back
); } EditProfile.propTypes = {}; export default globalConnect()(EditProfile);
